name: remove-window-from-set
title: Remove Window from Set
description: Try to click menu item "Remove Window from Set" from menu bar item "Window" with AppleScript. This menu item might be available when Stage Manager is enabled and the active Set has more than one Window.
author: silv

commands.name: remove-window-from-set
commands.title: Remove Window from Set
commands.description: Try to click menu item "Remove Window from Set" from menu bar item "Window" with AppleScript

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
